blocks.title: VyatSU positions in Russia and in the world:
elements: 44th place among Russian universities according to the global ranking of scientific institutions SCImago Institutions Rankings-2021
Included in 120 Russian universities of international QS ranking
39th place in National ranking of universities in the parameter «Education»
Included in TOP-100 of the «National Recognition»: "the best universities in 2020"

blocks.title: And also VyatSU is:
elements: 3427 places in comfortable hostels (the maximum number in the region)
2180 budget places (the maximum number in the region)
87% employment of university graduates in the specialty

blue_title: Our graduates live and work all over the world!
